roleset.name: make fireproof

example.name: only corpus ex is nominal
example.text: A spokesman for the company said the verdict is thought to be the first in favor of an asbestos manufacturer where the plaintiff was a school and the asbestos in question was used for fireproofing.

roleset.note: FIREPROOF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fireproof' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, but should go into one of the causative categories. (from fireproof.01-v predicate notes)
